example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS استدرك) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-2 (NP (NOUN_PROP سوريا)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PV_PASS+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS انتخبت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN عضوية) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المجلس)))))))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (PUNC ") (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تنحدر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN المستوى) (DET+ADJ المتدني))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الديبلوماسية))))) (PUNC "))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: To this low level of diplomacy
